The code in the previous few files has been curated for ease-of-use with a focus on the PARE model, which is the novel part of the paper.

Code for all three models PARE, Block Kriging, and Regional Max methods the full analysis as originally included in \cite{fagnant_spatiotemporal_2021} is available [on Github.](https://github.com/carly-fagnant/Spatial_Extreme_Value_Modeling)
